system.description:
You have learned to unleash your fury without hindering your ability to lead. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Charisma score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

  • While you are raging, the range of your Commanding Presence increases by 10 feet.

  • While you are raging, the damage healed by your Rallying Surge ability increases to 1d10 + your marshal level + half your berserker level.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in berserker, 3 levels in marshal
